citations.narrative:
No records of acquisition were provided for two big brown bats currently housed at the facility and these animals were not
reflected in the inventory of animals on hand. Facilities must make, keep and maintain records of all animals acquired,
owned, and held in their possession. Failure to maintain current and accurate records prevents APHIS officials from
verifying the sources and destinations of all animals held at a facility. The facility must ensure that records of acquisition
are maintained and that the inventory is kept up to date. Correct by December 10, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
No records of acquisition were provided for two big brown bats currently housed at the facility and these animals were not 
reflected in the inventory of animals on hand. Facilities must make, keep and maintain records of all animals acquired, 
owned, and held in their possession. Failure to maintain current and accurate records prevents APHIS officials from 
verifying the sources and destinations of all animals held at a facility. The facility must ensure that records of acquisition 
are maintained and that the inventory is kept up to date. Correct by December 10, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
